document_data.name: Omar Haraad
document_data.mainbody: '''Omar Haraad''' was the mayor of [[Amkethran]], although this was mainly just in name, as the village was controlled by the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Balthazar]].
document_data.History:
In the late 1360s [[DR]], Balthazar and his mercenaries essentially took control of the village Omar managed. After the occupation, Omar's residents were starving and dying all over the village by [[1368 DR]].

His daughter, [[Asana Haraad|Asana]], stole money from Balthazar's mercenaries, and they threatened to kill her. He commented that her actions were wrong, but her motives were pure, as she wished to feed the citizens. He cried out to the masses to stand up against the "brutes" that invaded his town. [[Gorion's Ward]] may have saved his daughter from public execution.
